text: @RobertJenrick He put no one else at risk? He travelled hundreds of miles with Covid-19 and a small child in the car, he went into hospital with the disease, he went for a stroll in Barnard castle... he put people at risk repeatedly, as have you by trashing the restrictions. You're a charlatan.
